title: Update website branding to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' while preserving Van Gogh theme

requirements.summary: Update Navigation component branding text to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' in all caps
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation header displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' in all caps
Van Gogh Starry Night styling and color palette remain unchanged

file_operations.description: Replace the logo/header text 'STARRY NIGHT EXPERIENCE' with 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' in the Navigation component while preserving all existing Starry Night theme styling, colors, and layout

requirements.summary: Update HomePage hero section h1 to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section h1 displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'
Van Gogh-inspired artistic typography styling is preserved
Starry Night artwork and visual theme remain intact

file_operations.description: Replace the hero section h1 text 'Starry Night Experience' with 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' while maintaining all Van Gogh-inspired typography styles, the Starry Night artwork (frontend/public/assets/generated/starry-night-hero.dim_1200x600.png), and the entire hero visual theme including colors and flowing shapes

requirements.summary: Update browser page title to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES'
acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab displays 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' as the page title

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag in the HTML document from 'House of Vigilantes' to 'THE HOUSE OF VIGILANTES' to match the new branding style
